channel.title: HomeMade Computer (again!)
channel.description:
Alright, I'm more intelligent that I was when I posted that shit last year. I started my project again, except this time I'm working with it to not make a light on a damn LED Board, but rather a computer monitor. Seems much more useful, unless you want a homemade computer to look like a calculator. Has anyone else been working on something similar. I'd love to buy parts and anything you'd recommend. I'll be taking classes over the summer to learn more about bigger and better electronics, like this crazy dude: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=qCj2deCFMnc Inspirational, eh? Of course, I don't think I'll get to running dern Assembly on mine, with a custom bios. A little crazy.
Bootnecklad was supposedly working on one. Still adding onto it?
